Trusted Legal Translation Services in Dubai
Answers to common questions about legal translation in Dubai
Are your translations accepted by UAE courts?

Yes. Every legal translation service we coordinate is executed by translators certified by the Ministry of Justice. Our translations are formatted specifically for Dubai Courts, DIFC, ADGM, and federal judicial bodies.
How quickly can you provide certified legal translation?
Standard documents (birth certificates, marriage certificates, educational credentials) are typically ready within 3–6 business hours. Express processing is available for urgent legal requirements.
Yes. When your legal documents require attestation from MOFA or other government entities, we coordinate the complete process including secure courier handling of originals.
Can you handle Arabic to English and English to Arabic?
Yes. Our certified translators work in both directions for comprehensive Arabic translation services.
